actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Post Office and Civil Service.

committees.committee: House Post Office and Civil Service

official_title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the granting of college scholarships by the Federal Government to Federal employees' sons and daughters having superior scholastic attainments.

summary.text: Provides for the granting of college scholarships by the Civil Service Commission to Federal employees' sons and daughters having superior scholastic attainments. (Adds 5 U.S.C. 7904)

titles.title: A bill to amend title 5, United States Code, to provide for the granting of college scholarships by the Federal Government to Federal employees' sons and daughters having superior scholastic attainments.
